cab.content: BATTLE SITUATION - NOON - 15th MAY, 1918.1. Gas Shelling of YPRES and our lines S. of ALBERT last night is reported.2. A few places behind our lines S. of ALBERT were heavily shelled by tho enemy last night.3. There is nothing further of interest to report.General Staff,War Office, S.W.1% 15th May, 1916.Issued at 12.30 p.m.
